title: Eco-innovative aquafeeds biofortified with Asparagopsis taxiformis to improve the resilience of farmed white seabream (Diplodus sargus) to marine heatwave events
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Isa Marmelo, Cátia Lourenço-Marques, Iris A.L. Silva, Florbela Soares, Pedro Pousão-Ferreira, Leonardo Mata, António Marques, Mário Sousa Diniz, Ana Luísa Maulvault
